channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-7162] Launcher error in yarn-client
item.description:
HADOOP_CONF_DIR=/usr/local/CDH5/hadoop-2.3.0-cdh5.0.1/etc/hadoop/ ./bin/spark-shell --master yarn-client --driver-memory 8g  --driver-libraryath $LD_LIBRARY_PATH:$JAVA_LIBRARY_PATH  --jars lib/hadoop-lzo-0.4.15-gplextras5.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar

=> 

Welcome to
      ____              __
     / __/__  ___ _____/ /__
    _\ \/ _ \/ _ `/ __/  '_/
   /___/ .__/\_,_/_/ /_/\_\   version 1.4.0-SNAPSHOT
      /_/

Using Scala version 2.10.4 (Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, Java 1.7.0_55)
Type in expressions to have them evaluated.
Type :help for more information.
spark.yarn.driver.memoryOverhead is set but does not apply in client mode.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
User 'witgo' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/5716
Looks OK but these dirs typically do not contain subdirectories.
